status.description: One of two values that indication if the requestresulted in an error.
status.title: status

count.description: The number of items in the Errors property array.
count.title: count

type.description: The type of the resource items in the Errors property array.
type.title: type

errors.description: The list of inidividual errors for the error repsonse

items.description: Description of individual errors that may have occurred during a request.

code.description: A human readable string that indicates the kind of error.
code.title: code

canRetry.description: Indicates whether the client can retry the request.
canRetry.title: canRetry

message.description: A short description of the error that was encountered. Will only be provided in non-production environments.
message.title: message

stackTrace.description: The stack trace, if available in the case an exception was thrown on the server while handling the request. Will only be provided in non-production environments.
stackTrace.title: stackTrace

items.title: DescriptionOfIndividualErrorsThatMayHaveOccurredDuringARequest

errors.title: errors
